results.description: Team GB's four-man bobsleigh team will receive their bronze medals from the 2014 Sochi Winter Olympics in November.

results.description: British Olympic bobsledder Joel Fearon will compete for Switzerland for the 2019-20 season after the GB team agreed to release him on loan.
results.title: GB Olympic bobsledder Joel Fearon to join Switzerland on temporary basis

results.description: Elise Christie is set to miss four World Cup races due to "ill health" and says she feels like a "complete failure".
results.title: Elise Christie: Speed skater out until January due to 'ill health'

results.description: Snowboarder Ellie Soutter's mother talks to the BBC about losing her daughter, finding her voice and helping others.
results.shortTitle: 'It's like having the battery taken out of me'
results.title: Ellie Soutter: British snowboarder’s mother on losing her daughter

results.description: Canada's double Olympic bobsleigh champion Kaillie Humphries will compete for the United States after a row over abuse allegations.
results.title: Kaillie Humphries: Canadian to compete for US after abuse row

thumbnail.altText: Canada's double Olympic champion Kaillie Humphries will compete for the United States

results.description: Canadian ice dancers and Olympic gold medallists Tessa Virtue and Scott Moir announce their retirement from the sport.
results.shortTitle: Ice dancers Moir and Virtue retire
results.title: Tessa Virtue and Scott Moir announce ice dancing retirement

results.description: Austrian alpine skier Marcel Hirscher calls time on a career which saw him win a record eight World Cup titles in a row.
results.title: Marcel Hirscher: Austrian calls time on record-breaking career

results.description: La Guardia Civil encontró este miércoles el cuerpo sin vida de la deportista Blanca Fernández Ochoa, quien llevaba 11 días desaparecida.

results.description: British snowboarder Katie Ormerod finishes second in the big air event on her first World Cup appearance in almost two years.

results.title: Katie Ormerod wins big air silver on World Cup return in New Zealand

results.shortTitle: Ormerod to make World Cup return

results.description: Reigning champion Bruce Mouat must win a play-off to represent Scotland at the European Championships, but Eve Muirhead is selected.

results.description: Canadian snowboarder Max Parrot, who won slopestyle silver at the Pyeongchang 2018 Winter Olympics, says he has "beaten" cancer.
